recipes.name: Classic Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream together butter and sugars until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla extract; mix well.
In a separate bowl, combine flour, baking soda, and salt.
Gradually add dry ingredients to the wet mixture.
Fold in chocolate chips.
Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 8-10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned.

recipes.name: Brownie Bites
recipes.description: Fudgy and rich chocolate brownie bites.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Melt butter and stir in sugar, eggs, and cocoa powder.
Mix in flour, salt, and baking powder until smooth.
Pour batter into a greased mini-muffin tin.
Bake for 10-12 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean.

recipes.name: Vanilla Cupcakes
recipes.description: Fluffy vanilla cupcakes with buttercream frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well.
Combine dry ingredients and add to the wet mixture alternately with milk.
Scoop batter into cupcake liners and bake for 20-25 minutes.

recipes.name: Tiramisu
recipes.description: A classic Italian dessert with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cheese.
instructions: Whisk egg yolks and sugar until thick and pale.
Fold in mascarpone cheese and whipped heavy cream.
Dip ladyfingers into coffee and layer in a dish.
Spread mascarpone mixture over each layer and dust with cocoa powder.
Chill for at least 4 hours before serving.

recipes.name: Lemon Bars
recipes.description: Tangy and sweet lemon bars with a buttery crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix butter, flour, and powdered sugar to form the crust.
Press into a baking dish and bake for 15 minutes.
Whisk together eggs, sugar, lemon juice, flour, and baking powder.
Pour over the crust and bake for an additional 20 minutes.
Cool before cutting into squares.

recipes.name: Cheesecake
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C).
Mix graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and melted butter; press into a springform pan.
Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
Stir in vanilla extract and pour over the crust.
Bake for 50-60 minutes or until the center is set.
Cool and refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving.

recipes.name: Chocolate Mousse
recipes.description: Light and airy chocolate mousse dessert.
instructions: Melt dark chocolate and let it cool slightly.
Separate eggs; whisk yolks with sugar until creamy.
Fold chocolate into the yolk mixture.
Whip heavy cream until stiff peaks form and fold into the chocolate mixture.
Beat egg whites until stiff and fold in gently.
Chill for at least 2 hours before serving.

recipes.name: Banana Bread
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mash bananas and mix with melted butter.
Add baking soda, salt, sugar, egg, and vanilla; mix well.
Stir in flour until just combined.
Pour into a greased loaf pan and bake for 60-65 minutes.
Cool before slicing.

recipes.name: Peach Cobbler
recipes.description: Warm peach cobbler with a buttery crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Melt butter in a baking dish.
Mix sugar, flour, baking powder, and salt; add milk and stir until smooth.
Pour batter over melted butter.
Arrange peach slices over the batter and sprinkle with sugar.
Bake for 40-45 minutes or until golden brown.

recipes.name: Red Velvet Cake
recipes.description: Rich red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
Mix dry ingredients in one bowl and wet ingredients in another.
Combine wet and dry ingredients until smooth.
Pour batter into greased cake pans and bake for 30-35 minutes.
Cool and frost with cream cheese frosting.

recipes.name: Strawberry Shortcake
recipes.description: Layers of biscuits, strawberries, and whipped cream.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
Cut in butter until crumbly; add milk to form a dough.
Drop by spoonfuls onto a baking sheet and bake for 12-15 minutes.
Mix strawberries with sugar and layer with biscuits and whipped cream.

recipes.name: Creme Brulee
recipes.description: Creamy custard with a caramelized sugar top.
instructions: Preheat oven to 325°F (160°C).
Heat cream and vanilla until just simmering.
Whisk egg yolks and sugar, then slowly add cream.
Pour into ramekins and bake in a water bath for 30-40 minutes.
Cool, then sprinkle sugar on top and caramelize with a torch.

recipes.name: Pumpkin Pie
recipes.description: Classic spiced pumpkin pie with a flaky crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 425°F (220°C).
Mix pumpkin, sugar, salt, and spices.
Add eggs and evaporated milk, mixing until smooth.
Pour into pie crust and bake for 15 minutes.
Reduce temperature to 350°F (175°C) and bake for 40-50 minutes.

recipes.name: Apple Crisp
recipes.description: Warm apple crisp with a crumbly oat topping.
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix apples with sugar, cinnamon, and nutmeg; spread in a baking dish.
Combine oats, flour, brown sugar, and butter to form crumbs.
Sprinkle topping over apples and bake for 40-45 minutes.

recipes.name: Panna Cotta
recipes.description: Silky smooth cream dessert topped with fruit sauce.
instructions: Heat cream and sugar until sugar dissolves.
Dissolve gelatin in water and mix into cream mixture.
Stir in vanilla and pour into molds.
Chill for 4 hours and serve with fruit sauce.
